last_episode_to_air.name: Episode #1.6
last_episode_to_air.overview: The end of the next dry season brings the series strands together. Sirga chases eland. Three male lions are moved into an electrified enclosure. A scientist comes to take samples of maggots that are found in the slaughtered wildebeest's horns. Val moves a one-eyed lion into another enclosure. On a morning hunt Sirga chases down a wildebeest calf.

name: Saving Sirga: Journey into the Heart of a Lion
original_name: Saving Sirga: Journey into the Heart of a Lion
overview: Filmed with unrivaled intimacy this unforgettable and authentic story takes an in-depth look at a remarkable cross-species bond, and the passion and dedication required to save just one lion.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Filmed with unrivaled intimacy this unforgettable and authentic story takes an in-depth look at a remarkable cross-species bond, and the passion and dedication required to save just one lion.
